casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tae Kwon HAMMONDS 389A15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2017 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hammonds, Tae Kwon. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. John R. Rittelmeyer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of March 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of March 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 7th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
